reason: The proof in 1.5.3.1 establishes convergence in L^p(mu) for ALL p >= 1, which is strictly stronger than the 'convergence in probability under mu' stated in the node 1.5.3 claim. The parent node statement should be updated to reflect this stronger result, as the L^p convergence is used downstream (e.g., in establishing integrability of the limiting Radon-Nikodym derivative). This is a positive observation, not an error.
